Package life.threedee

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ThreeDeeObject  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Represents a basic camera.
    It renders objects in the objects List using a few worker threads, creating as many threads as processors available.
    CameraSlave
    A camera worker thread.
    Matrix
    A generic matrix
    Plane
    A Plane, represented with an origin point and normal vector.
    POC3D
    Original proof of concept class.
    Point
    A single point.
    TColorTransfer
    Contains the data for the rendering of a given ThreeDeeObject, including the T value (see calculateT of ThreeDeeObject), the color at that given point of intersection, and the ThreeDeeObject from which this TColorTransfer originates.
    TexturedPlane
    A plane that has a texture on it, does not extend past it's texture.
    Triangle
    A Triangle represented by 3 points
    Vector
    Represents a three dimensional vector in component form and provides methods for common calculations such as dot product and cross product as well as methods for converting to and from polar coordinates
    WorldObject
    A threedeeobject representing multiple threedeeobjects as an array
